skins.selfIntroduction: Lead ship of the Super Akizuki-class... That is I, Kitakaze. During the war, I was not able to display my prowess upon the battlefield, but it is not too late to do so here. Bear witness to my agility as well as the strengths of my armaments.
skins.acquisition: Indeed, the preparations are complete... Now that I, Kitakaze, shall be assisting you with your operational command, you can now sleep more soundly at night, Commander. Heheh!
skins.login: Commander, you¡¯ve come. I am currently training this little one. Indeed, I must teach it to stand like a general.
skins.details: Those who lead upon the battlefield must also carry their own blade... Worry not, this one is not heavy at all.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My Akizuki-class sisters have always taken good care of me. I, Kitakaze, swear to meet their expectations, and will work hard to protect everyone.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I prefer strategizing and leading from the rear over fighting in the frontlines... B-but I¡¯m perfectly capable of fighting head on.
skins.secretaryIdle3: True power comes from the strength of one¡¯s convictions. It would behoove you to not underestimate my abilities!
skins.secretaryTouch: Being small has its advantages... Heheh. For example, don¡¯t even try to hit me in a game of dodgeball!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmm... The responsibility of cleaning up your conduct weighs heavily upon me, but... please cease your crass behavior.

skins.shipDescription: All the preparations are now complete... Commander, let us sally forth and conquer these festival grounds! ...But before that, can we get something to eat first?
